item.title: Travlr Full Stack App
item.author: adrienne.sturgeon@snhu.edu (Adrienne Sturgeon)
item.description:
I have provided a link to download the Travlr App Original and Improved Versions Here: Travlr App

Artifact Three Narrative

Artifact Overview
This artifact is a web authentication system that uses Angular for the frontend and Express.js for the backend. It supports secure logins by storing JSON Web Tokens (JWT) in cookies, allowing authenticated access without revealing sensitive credentials. The system started with a focus on creating smooth and secure login experiences. Through successive improvements, it became more efficient in managing token timing, error reporting, and frontend-backend interactions. I was also able to successfully implement an authorization strategy in addition to the existing authentication system.
